mapper.select: select c.cou_code, c.cou_name, crg.COMPLETION_STATUS, EXAM_STATUS, crg.crg_code, TRUNC(REGISTRATIONDATE + COU_PERIOD - SYSDATE) AS remainingperiod from COURSES c , COURSE_REGISTRATION crg, EXAM_PARTICIPATION ep where crg.ui_id = #{uiId} and crg.crg_code = ep.crg_code and c.cou_code = crg.cou_code and crg.COMPLETION_STATUS = 'N'
